channel.title: Comments for page "Ultimate Pizza"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ultimate Pizza"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: No. Flavor text from both this and other pizzas declare ONLY dou increase.

item.title: stats go where?
item.content:encoded: So, I can't figure this out… Do the strength and range from ultimate pizzas only apply to doujutsu, or to GNT? (never ate any, passed infiltration purely on yummies)

item.title: no team changes needed
item.content:encoded: i use a team of lulu lv.2, karen, and euthanasia. (unsure what would happen if karen was leveled due to being stuck on infiltration) however, the combination of drops here give you all ingredients needed to create the Ultimate Pizza.
